title: Verify Supplier Certificate of Conformance (CoC)
description: A shipment has been received with a supplier's Certificate of Conformance (CoC). An inspector needs to verify it.

tasks.description: Scan or upload the supplier CoC document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent attaches the CoC to the receiving record in the system.

tasks.description: Verify that the information on the CoC (part number, quantity, PO number) matches the shipment details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that all details on the certificate match the physical shipment and PO.

tasks.description: Mark the CoC as verified and approved in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the status of the receiving record to show the CoC is approved.
